creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long coat with long sleeves; red with thin variegated cream and black stripes; white, red, green and yellow ikat under sleeves; neckline and top front opening have red and black panels embroidered with scrolling designs in green, black, white, yellow, purple and red; small coins at bottom of embroidered panels; embroidery backed with predominately pink and purple floral printed fabric
title: Man's coat
